title: Hendrik Fick Renaldo Potgieter
subTitle: Graduate Golang software developer @Nile.ag
description: I am a self-sufficient, diligent, and imaginative person who also possesses dependability and has learned to approach tasks and situations with responsibility and ethics. I have great teamwork and communication skills. I firmly believe in moral principles and integrity, and that a person should aim for success in both their personal and professional lives. I also think that if you work hard and have a positive outlook on everything you do, you can succeed in whatever you put your energy into.
